name: Funeral Potatoes
ingredients: 2 lbs. Southern-­‐Style hash browns 1/3 cup onion chopped
1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese 1 stick melted butter
1 cup sour cream 1 1/2 cups crushed cornflakes
1 can cream of chicken soup 4 T. butter
steps: Combine hash browns, cheese, sour cream, soup, onion, and melted butter. Mix well and put into greaded 9 x13 pan. Top
with cornflakes and drizzle with remaining butter (melted) Bake at 350 for 40-­‐50 min.
